name: Rebirth
description:
You are Toby, a boy who's life was changed after entering a state of comatose when a car accident sent him to the hospital. Toby wakes up as his favorite stuffed toy in a strange world greeted by a flying cat named Leo. The only way out of his coma is to fight for his life and get back to reality, or be stuck in this world forever...


You Choose Who Can Leave and Who Will Stay

Rebirth is a game filled with tears and laughter. Feel like a hero in the beginning of your adventure by defeating your nightmares and sending the people of your choosing on a one way ticket out of this world. Then, feel the desperation in their voices as your journey comes to an end and they realize that not all of them can go home.What You Will Experience
  • A breathtaking story about a boy and his journey home
  • Choices will affect how other people in the world act as your journey progresses
  • Outstanding original music unique to each fight
  • Dark humor
  • Challenging reflex based boss fights
  • Health is not the only thing that keeps you alive, be careful of how afraid Toby can get...

A Unique and Dynamic Health Bar

  • Health does not regenerate
  • Receive rewards by sending people home
  • Exchange rewards for health and sanity points to continue your fight
